Class EconomyBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • EconomyBoard

  • public class EconomyBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that sets up and is used to control aspects of the economy board of the game

        Constructor for objects of class Economy Board.
        Parameters:
        consumerMarketPrice - The amount that gas can be sold on the consumer market for
        domGasPrice - The price of gas on the domestic market.
        domOilPrice - The price of oil on the domestic market.
        forGasPrice - The price of gas on the foreign market.
        forOilPrice - The price of oil on the foreign market.
